MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 04-NOV-2020 18:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the G72 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.45pm. This is to safely carry out repairs to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:32am on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
